cooked in a style originally from the French city of Lyon, usually with onions: Lyonnaise potatoes The chicken was served with peas and Lyonnaise potatoes. The salmon salad was followed by chicken lyonnaise.
More examplesFewer examplesThe Lyonnaise potatoes were pan-fried in butter with thinly sliced onions and parsley.The main course came with tiny lyonnaise potatoes and pickled baby vegetables.Their Salade Lyonnaise is heart of frisee lettuce with onions, poached egg, bacon, croutons and sherry vinaigrette. Lyonnaise sauce is a French sauce of white wine, vinegar and onions. The lyonnaise soup with caramelized onions and gruyere cheese was delicious.
